Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

VXSCAN is focusing on affordable prices, top quality for every customer.

You Can Trust VXSCAN

VXSCAN is to make our products serve everyone in need all over the world. To this end, we will devote ourselves to professional research and strive to make the best of our products and services.

The Goal of VXSCAN

It is aiming to provide automobile repairers with more professional, simple, practical, economical, efficient and high-quality auto diagnosis products and maintenance tools.

The Service of VXSCAN

To provide an better service customer is one of important reasons for our success and our eternal goal.

VXSCAN is committed to doing an professional supplier of automobile maintenance products,focuses on sloving automotive aftermamrket problems cost-effectively,effciently and conveniently.We hope make every user satisfied is our ultimate pursuit of every product.

„ÄêEVAP Leak Detector„ÄëV3 Smoke machine can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems. the provided mineral oil creates smoke that‚Äôs pumped it through your vehicle‚Äôs piping to help you detect the leak‚Äôs precise location.
„ÄêWhy You Need V3„ÄëThese Situations – 1.The rupture of the vacuum hose will cause the mixture to be too thick, the idle speed will increase, the hot car will not start well, the engine will surge during acceleration, the fuel consumption will increase significantly, and the exhaust pipe will emit black smoke.2. Blocking will cause the idle speed to drift, and the idle speed is easy to stall.3. Air leakage in the vacuum tube will cause the engine to run weakly.
„ÄêEasy Operation„Äë1.Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.2. Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.3. Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.4.The pipe will be filled with smoke. Check the leak points. NoteÔºöThe packaging does not contain oil but there is an oil delivery bottle.
„ÄêAdjustable Air Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge Display„ÄëYou can easily control the air pressure, because if the air pressure is too high, the pipe will be damaged, and if the air pressure is too low, the leak will not be detected; You can observe the barometer to determine whether the car pipeline is leaking. If the barometer index keeps increasing, there is no problem with your car‚Äôs pipeline. On the contrary, your car‚Äôs pipeline leaks need to be repaired.
„ÄêWide Compatibility„ÄëFuel pipe leakage locator is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats. It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 automotive diagnostic smoke leak detector is designed for testing leaks in vehicle pipe systems.

It could be used on all cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATV, light trucks, boats, etc.

With VXSCAN V3, you can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems.

Full System Diagnoses, Won’t Miss Any Leak.

  • Crankcase System Test: Excessive pressure or corrosion of the crankcase is the main reason to damage the seal of the crankcase and cause oil leakage.
  • Intake System Test: Leakage in the air intake system will lead to insufficient intake of the car engine, which will result in scant engine power.
  • Car Sealing Test: Poor airtightness of the car may lead to a lot of inconvenience like inability to keep warm, not soundproof, not waterproof and not dust-proof, etc.
  • Fuel Tank System Test: When there are gaps in the fuel tank and piping caused by improper installation or insufficient sealing of the fuel tank cap, it can cause leaks in the fuel tank system.
  • Turbo Test: The leakage of coolant would cause the engine to report high water temperature.
  • Various Pipe Fitting Test: Smoke testing of brake hoses, power steering hoses, cooling system hoses, air conditioning system hoses, turbocharger hoses, fuel hoses, intake and exhaust system hoses, etc.
  • EVAP System Test: Leakage of the fuel evaporation system will cause fuel vapor to leak into the atmosphere, causing waste and pollution or unstable engine idling.
  • Exhaust System Test: Unpurified harmful gases to be discharged into the atmosphere or increase vehicle noise is the main disadvantage when leaks happened in the exhaust.

How to Operate the Automotive Smoke Leak Detector

Step 1

  • Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.

Step 2

  • Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.

Step 3

  • Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.

Step 4

  • The pipe will be filled with smoke.Check the leak points.

Read more

Package Includes

  • 1pc x VXSCAN V3 Main Unit
  • 1pc x Standard Cone Adapter (30-85mm)
  • 1pc x Funnel
  • 1pc x Replacement Rubber
  • 1pc x Intake bladder
  • 1pc x Smoke Hose
  • 1pc x Power Cord Clamp
  • 1pc x Test Oil Refill Bottle(oil not included)
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5.1 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

VXSCAN V3 Vacuum Smoke Tester Functions:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

EVAP V3 vacuum leak tester can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

  • Product Specifications:
  • Power Supply: 12V Vehicle Battery, <8Amp
  • Output Pressure: <1.2bar
  • Flow Rate: <7L/Min
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Working Cycle: 5 Min auto-stop

Read more

2 Mode: No need to buy extra air compressor

Air Mode: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE. It can help you test whether there is a leak in the pipe by injecting air into the pipe, and judge by the sound made when the air leaks.

Smoke Mode: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal. It helps you lacate the leak accuarately through the visible smoke. The smoke can be produced within seconds, dramatically reducing diagnostic time.

Overheat & Anti-frost Protection: Built in self-protective system

V3 EVAP vacuum tester is equipped with the latest intelligent protection device.

When the temperature of the device exceeds 70 degrees Celsius, the power protection device will be intelligently activated to turn it off, to ensure the safety of the operator and the device.

The device is also suitable for low temperature operation.

Wide Compatibility: Suitable for all vechicles

VXSCAN V3 vacuum leak smoke machine is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats.

It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

Read more

Pressure Gauge Displays

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

5
Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

Date First Available May 25, 2016

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:21 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT ANCEL

ANCEL is committed to solving automotive aftermarket

problems cost-effectively,efficiently and conveniently.

Our Vision

We strive to make friends with our customers with excellent products and quality services, and to be the company most trusted by our customers.

Our Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Our Value

The company constantly strives for product quality, technology, design and sustainability and adheres to the spirit of people-oriented and innovative efforts to make great contributions in the field of automotive technology.

Black Friday Deals

EVAP SMOKE MACHINES SERIES

HEAVY TRUCK SCAN TOOL SERIES

CAR BATTERY TESTER SERIES

CEL Doctor: The ANCEL AD310 is one of the best-selling OBD II scanners on the market and is recommended by Scotty Kilmer, a YouTuber and auto mechanic. It can easily determine the cause of the check engine light coming on, quickly read and clear diagnostic trouble codes, read live data & hard memory data, view freeze frame, I/M monitor readiness and collect vehicle information. Instead of taking car to mechanic shop, you can use it to check the trouble code and show code definition by yourself.
Sturdy and Compact: Equipped with a 2.5 foot cable made of very thick, flexible insulation. It is important to have a sturdy scanner as it can easily fall to the ground when working in a car. The AD310 OBD2 scanner is a well-constructed device with a sleek design. It weighs 12 ounces and measures 8.9 x 6.9 x 1.4 inches. Thanks to its compact design and light weight, transporting the device is not a problem. The buttons are clearly labelled and the screen is large and displays results clearly.
Accurate Fast and Easy to Use: The AD310 scanner can help you or your mechanic understand if your car is in good condition, provides exceptionally accurate and fast results, reads and clears engine trouble codes in seconds. If you want to find out the cause of the check engine light, this device will let you know immediately and fix the problem right away without any car knowledge. No need for batteries or a charger, get power directly from the OBDII Data Link Connector in your vehicle.
OBDII Protocols and Car Compatibility: Many cheap scan tools do not really support all OBD2 protocols. This is not the case with the AD310 scanner as it can support all OBDII protocols such as KWP2000, J1850 VPW, ISO9141, J1850 PWM and CAN. This device also has extensive vehicle compatibility with 1996 US-based, 2000 EU-based and Asian cars, light trucks, SUVs, as well as newer OBD2 and CAN vehicles both domestic and foreign. Check compatibility with your vehicle model before purchasing.
Home Necessity and Worthy to Own: This is an excellent code reader to travel or home with as it weighs less and it is compact in design. You can easily slide it in your backpack as you head to the garage, or put it on the dashboard, this will be a great fit for you. The AD310 is not only portable, but also accurate and fast in performance. Moreover, it covers various car brands and is suitable for people who just need a code reader to check their car.


Previous page

  1. Read & clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs), identify and address check engine light (CEL) issues.

  2. Just plug it into your car's OBD II port, turn on the ignition, and you are ready to go.

  3. Works on most 1996 and newer vehicles (cars, light trucks, minivans and SUVs) sold in North America.

  4. Even a beginner can operate this device, no car knowledge required.

  5. Insulated cables and a rugged plastic case protect your device from the elements in your workplace.

Next page

1 Main Features 2 Connectivity 3 Vehicle Compatibility 4 Easy To Use 5 Quality Construction

6 Extra Features You Should Know About

Previous page

  1. Enhanced Functions

    It can do essential work like resetting monitors, CEL issues, and clearing codes. It can also read live data, collect vehicle information, freeze data and display code definitions on the screen.

  2. Impressive Build Quality

    Each product must undergo a 48-hour aging test before leaving the factory. This helps reduce the chance of components on the PCB falling off during shipping and extends the life of the product.

  3. Patent-Protected

    All ANCEL product designs have independent patents and intellectual property rights, and the products also comply with CE, FCC and other relevant certification standards.

  4. Cost-Effectiveness

    Instead of going to a mechanic, car owners can do some basic maintenance themselves by learning some basic skills and buying the right tools like the AD310 scanner, which can cut costs significantly.

  5. Exhaustive Car Checkups

    With ANCEL AD310 OBD2 scanner, you can read and clear trouble codes in any OBD2-compliant vehicle, domestic or foreign, as long as it was manufactured after 1996, in Europe and Asia after 2000.

  6. SMOG Check Helper

    You can use the AD310 OBD2 scanner to make sure the monitor has been set before you take it to emissions test, helps you pass a vehicle SMOG check easily.

Next page

A battery or battery charger is not required. Once connected to your vehicle's 16-pin OBDII DLC, the unit will turn on and prompt you to start the ignition. If your vehicle has a check engine light on, the AD310 scanner is the first tool that can help you determine the cause and find a solution.

Find More ANCEL AD310 Scanner Reviews On Social Media

Where's the OBDII interface?

The OBD2 port is often under the dash, or under a panel below the handbrake in the central console.

How to get started?

Key operation: 1. turn the ignition on without starting the car; 2. Start the car.

Keyless operation: 1. press start button - press again (do not press brake pedal) - insert tool and read; 2. press brake pedal and start button.

Why I can't erase the fault code?

The fault causing the fault code to show will need to be repaired first then code can be erased.

Will it diagnose ABS or SRS?

Unfortunately, no. The main function of AD310 scanner is to detect the engine system, read and clear the fault codes, but Ancel AD610 can do ABS and SRS.

What should I pay attention to before buying?

Two things you should know: 1. it works only on cars with 12V battery; 2. your car must be standard OBD II protocol (16pin DLC).

More Other Products from ANCEL Store

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles

We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé VXSCAN
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B0B1QGP86W

„ÄêEVAP SMOKE MACHINE„ÄëVXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
„ÄêEASY TO USE„ÄëBy heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
„ÄêSMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE„ÄëEquipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
„ÄêAir Mode & Smoke Mode„ÄëThe V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
„ÄêWIDELY COMPATIBILITY„ÄëOur package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120‚ÑÉ, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20‚ÑÉ. You don‚Äôt have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

From the brand

AUTEL, a famous brand in the automotive aftermarket, is synonymous with high quality, experience, and professionalism.

Since 2004, AUTEL has been deeply involved in global automotive diagnostics and inspections. After years of independent research, development, and innovation, we‚Äôve formed our own unique core technology accumulation.

Now, AUTEL products allow us to see how significantly they changed ways of global auto repair and maintenance.

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

„ÄêTURN OFF CEL„Äë This AL319 car diagnostic tool supports Reading DTCs, displaying Live Data, Freeze Frame & I/M Readiness etc to figure out the root cause of the Check Engine Light (CEL) and turning it off, to help you detect any potential problems, and to avoid excessive costs for unnecessary repairs.
„ÄêEXTENSIVE APPLICATION„Äë Autel AL319 Compatible with 7 languages (English, French, Spanish, etc.) and various post-1996 OBD II protocol vehicles (Toyota, Nissan, Honda, Ford, etc.), this OBD II scanner provides accurate and fast diagnosis for worldwide car owners.
„ÄêFOR END USER & DIYERS„Äë This error code reader AL319 is ‚Äúplug and play‚Äù and comes with an easy interface. Even if you‚Äôre not familiar with vehicle repair, you can quickly take control of this obd2 scanner, and get the information you want.
„ÄêUSER-FRIENDLY DESIGN„Äë This check engine code reader features a patented One-Click I/M Readiness Key, TFT color display, built-in speaker, LED Indicator etc. The cable is long enough without being too long and getting in the way. No batteries are needed.
„ÄêHIGH-QUALITY SERVICES„Äë 12 months warranty from the date of purchase and lifetime free update are offered by this Automobile OBDII scan tool. Welcome to contact us via Q&A, email, or hotline, and our after-sale-service team for technical support.
